item.title: Biljana add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you can love someone with your whole heart, even one person, then there's salvation in life. Even if you can't get together with that person." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart and try to love the questions themselves, like locked rooms and like books that are now written in a very foreign tongue. Do not now seek the answers, which cannot be given you because you would not be able to live them. And the point is, to live everything. Live the questions now. Perhaps you will then gradually, without noticing it, live along some distant day into the answer." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Much unhappiness has come into the world because of bewilderment and things left unsaid." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Biljana add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "Life's under no obligation to give us what we expect." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If you love someone, you must be prepared to set them free." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Biljana add a quote by Bette Davis
item.description: "When a man gives his opinion, he's a man. When a woman gives her opinion, she's a bitch." -- Bette Davis
